targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
  date_time,
  client_ip,
  http_status,
  request_url,
  response_bytes,
  user_agent,
  cache_status,
  referrer,
  http_method,
  response_time
FROM "cdn_logs_alibaba_partitioned"."cdn_logs_parquet" 
WHERE 
  -- Optimized partition filtering
  year BETWEEN date_format($__timeFrom(), '%Y') AND date_format($__timeTo(), '%Y')
  -- Time range with timezone conversion (UTC+8 to UTC)
  AND date_add('hour', -8, date_parse(date_time, '%d/%b/%Y:%H:%i:%s')) BETWEEN $__timeFrom() AND $__timeTo()
  -- Data quality filters
  AND response_bytes > 0
  AND http_status IS NOT NULL
  -- Dynamic variable filters
  AND (${statusCode:sqlstring})
  AND (${clientIP:sqlstring})
  AND (${channelName:sqlstring})
ORDER BY date_time DESC
LIMIT 1000

list.definition: SELECT DISTINCT http_status as __text, http_status as __value FROM "cdn_logs_alibaba_partitioned"."cdn_logs_parquet" WHERE http_status IS NOT NULL ORDER BY http_status
list.label: Status Code
list.name: statusCode

query.rawSql: SELECT DISTINCT http_status as __text, http_status as __value FROM "cdn_logs_alibaba_partitioned"."cdn_logs_parquet" WHERE http_status IS NOT NULL ORDER BY http_status

list.definition: SELECT DISTINCT client_ip as __text, client_ip as __value FROM "cdn_logs_alibaba_partitioned"."cdn_logs_parquet" WHERE client_ip IS NOT NULL ORDER BY client_ip
list.label: Client IP
list.name: clientIP

query.rawSql: SELECT DISTINCT client_ip as __text, client_ip as __value FROM "cdn_logs_alibaba_partitioned"."cdn_logs_parquet" WHERE client_ip IS NOT NULL ORDER BY client_ip

list.definition: SELECT DISTINCT regexp_extract(request_url, '/([^/]+)/', 1) as __text, regexp_extract(request_url, '/([^/]+)/', 1) as __value FROM "cdn_logs_alibaba_partitioned"."cdn_logs_parquet" WHERE request_url IS NOT NULL AND regexp_extract(request_url, '/([^/]+)/', 1) != '' ORDER BY __text
list.label: Channel Name
list.name: channelName

query.rawSql: SELECT DISTINCT regexp_extract(request_url, '/([^/]+)/', 1) as __text, regexp_extract(request_url, '/([^/]+)/', 1) as __value FROM "cdn_logs_alibaba_partitioned"."cdn_logs_parquet" WHERE request_url IS NOT NULL AND regexp_extract(request_url, '/([^/]+)/', 1) != '' ORDER BY __text
